import axios from"axios";import{toast}from"react-toastify";export var setAxiosAuthToken=function setAxiosAuthToken(token){if(typeof token!=="undefined"&&token){// Apply for every request
axios.defaults.headers.common["Authorization"]="Token "+token;}else{// Delete auth header
delete axios.defaults.headers.common["Authorization"];}};export var toastOnError=function toastOnError(error){if(error.response){// known error
toast.error(JSON.stringify(error.response.data));}else if(error.message){toast.error(JSON.stringify(error.message));}else{toast.error(JSON.stringify(error));}};export var isEmpty=function isEmpty(value){return value===undefined||value===null||typeof value==="object"&&Object.keys(value).length===0||typeof value==="string"&&value.trim().length===0;};
